displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this dla classification.

mutuallyExclusive.description: Dlas under this dla classification are mutually exclusive. When mutually exclusive is `true` the dlas from this dla classification are used to **classify** an entity. An entity can only be in one class - example, it can only be either `tier1` or `tier2` and not both. When mutually exclusive is `false`, the dlas from this dla classification are used to **categorize** an entity. An entity can be in multiple categories simultaneously - example a customer can be `newCustomer` and `atRisk` simultaneously.
